body.name: Yozai Men's Winter Coat, Warm Jackets for Mens Water Resistant Ski Snow Jacket Mountain Windbreaker Hooded Parka, S-2XL
features: Fabric type Flannel Lining+Taslan Composite Fabric

Warm and Comfortable Lining: The men winter coat is made of skin-friendly and soft flannel lining, which provides excellent warmth, and can effectively block the cold air, creating a warm and comfortable wearing experience. The detachable hood is also lined with flannel, to keep you warm and cozy during the cold winter months, allows for a comfortable, free-flowing fit.

Windproof and Water Resistant Outer Layer: The outer layer of the men's winter coats is made of taslon composite fabric, which effectively protects against rain, snow and wet weather, providing excellent windproof and water resistance. And this fabric is lightweight and comfortable, maintaining some breathability and abrasion resistance, providing outstanding comfort and durability for the wearer.

Windproof and Warm Design: The winter coats for men features a double-layer design with zippers and invisible buttons, which effectively prevents cold winds from intruding, keeps you warm while maintaining a stylish appearance. The cuffs of the men's cotton jacket are designed with ribbed cuffs, which can tightly wrap around the wrists, effectively protect them from the cold wind.

Multifunctional Pocket Design: The winter jacket for men is equipped with multiple exterior pockets and 1 lined pocket, the lined pocket is convenient for keeping valuables in a safe place, while the abundant exterior pockets provide plenty of storage space for cell phones, wallets, passports and other small items.

Comfortable Fit: Comfortable and warm men winter jacket are available in a wide range of sizes and colors to ensure a perfect fit. Perfect for everyday wear as well as hiking, hunting, rafting, camping, fishing, shooting, skiing, snowshoeing and other outdoor activities.

Warm and Comfortable Lining Men's winter coat is lined with skin-friendly and soft flannel lining, providing you with warmth and a comfortable wearing experience. Windproof and Water Resistant The outer layer of the men's winter coat is made from a taslon composite fabric that effectively protects against rain, snow and wet weather, providing superior windproof and water resistance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this more then expected…..
reviews.reviewText: This jacket arrived yesterday. I am a hard critic. This jacket is very nice. I wore it today it was below zero. It feel good on my body. It’s a nice jacket overall. It kept me warm. I love all the pockets. I was able to purchase the khaki color it’s nice. The hood is just right. They actually told me what size to order. It fits perfect. It came sealed. I love it. I was gonna order another jacket But could not resist the comments and the price was very nice in this inflation. It has a zipper and snaps. I’m a female and I love this winter coat here in Mn. I did not expect this jacket to be this nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Coat-Fabulous Price
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this coat for my 22 year old son who was heading to the East coast and to very cold temperatures. The jacket is very warm, has a lot of pockets (inside and out) to properly store things, and has a very soft and warm lining. It is a good-quality coat, with a strong zipper, nice sized-sleeves, and cuffs that hug your wrist to prevent cold air and snow from getting in. He is very pleased with the coat and I am very pleased with the price. I highly recommend this coat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice warm jacket
reviews.reviewText: Bought for wearing around the house actually. I needed to replace a very worn but warm corduroy jacket and shopped around for a couple of years hoping to find something similar. Levi's corduroy trucker jackets with sherpa lining seemed like a good option but the one I have with a canvas shell is not warm enough so I kept looking. This parka was suggested by Amazon and it was substantially discounted. It's a very warm jacket, well styled, comfortable. Don't need a hood indoors but it's nice to have. Ideally I would have preferred a shorter jacket with a more stylish collar but since I couldn't find one...The thing I like least about the jacket is that some of the inside insulation is sprouting through the shell. It's white spun polyester and must be cut or shaved off since if you try to pull it seems to have no end. Also the jacket is made of 100% polyester and doesn't breathe as well as my cotton shell corduroy jacket did but it's not bad.It's easy to wipe it clean if you spill something on it. In general I'm happy with it. Meets or exceeds my requirements for style, comfort, washability, and warmth at a decent price. I expect it will be reasonably durable, but only time will tell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight yet just as warm as your heaviest coat!
reviews.reviewText: This coat is so perfect! It’s nice and warm! It’s light! It’s so warm though! It’s wind proof! It’s so soft inside! There are tons of pockets outside and inside! True to size fit! My son loves it! Great purchase!! Only downfall is it’s not waterproof ( only water resistant)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Terrific Quality for the Money
reviews.reviewText: Love this parka! Beautifully made and with the best main zipper I've ever had on a winter coat. Most of them snag or jam all the time. This jacket has a huge oversized zipper that works faultlessly. In addition, many pockets and very nicely made of good material. A favorite of mine that is warm and fashionable without spending hundreds of dollars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Medium 5’6” athletic build (long walks in the beach) fits perfectly
reviews.reviewText: Material seems to be of decent durable quality, perfect for snow and is in fact waterproof, plenty pockets to store your phone wallet keys and even a micro Bluetooth speaker when snowboarding or skiing-previous comments about the removeable hood being too big?🤷‍♂️ (the logic behind that is for the hood to be big enough to cover your helmet when on the ski lift when it gets windy on the way up, if the oversized hood is such an issue for most, feel free to exercise your use of the zipper? the hood is removable 🤷‍♂️ Just sayin…for what I paid for this item, I have no regrets and I’m confident this jacket will last me quite a few seasons, being ex military the camo color was simply befitting for my liking…I would highly recommend this jacket, they really should be charging more for this item as I feel bad for paying such a low price for the jacket I feel like I stole the jacket seriously $30.00 this was an absolute deal, I’m very shocked they still more in stock-Buy this item now, even if you don’t ski or snowboard it’s really warm and comfortable for cold weather outings-buy this jacket you will not be disappointed!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am a woman and this is the first time I hv ever purchased a men's coat. I was hoping for my same size but roomier and I'm glad I picked this jacket. It's sooooo warm, soft and not bulky. The multiple pockets is my favorite thing and the hood w the fur adds the warmth u need to scurry from outside to inside then I flip it off. It's also removable and oh the length is perfect I'm 5,7 it catches me below my thighs. Best jacket I hv ever purchased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Jacket fits perfectly. Better than expected. Nice item.
reviews.reviewText: Exactly as described. Model portrayal to show fit is exactly on point. My size is Medium. Sleeve length was a concern. True to size (Exact) Quality Excellent. Warm and not encumbering or bulky. Zippers operate perfectly!. Very happy customer.
I am satisfied with this jacket, Good for fall and winter. It has a fur lining and many pockets. The hood is removable.

reviews.reviewTitle: Men's Winter Jacket Military Warm Fleece Coat
reviews.reviewText: Very decent winter coat, warm enough for my area. No sweater required.Not sure if suitaable for someone living in Alaska or the North West Territories of Canada,but keeps me warm in minus 4 degrees C.What I fail to understand is why such a huge difference in price for different colours.The Black one that I wanted is more that twice the price of the beige that I purchased.Go figure!
…and it passed the test. Winnipeg winters are not kind, but this jacket made it more bearable. Comfortable and practical.

Pros1. Large size fits loose, looks great.2. Great for stretching and moving.3. SO MANY pockets. Most of them are large and zippered.Cons1. Made in China. Had some weird smell.2. Thin. The fillings are polyester. Even though the inner fleece makes it seem a little bit “warmer” than it actually feels, you can’t survive the Canadian winters just with this. You would need to wear some jacket inside this to keep the wind from coming at your stomach.3. Zippers are rough. ALL of them. You will need some lubricant to smooth them.4. The hat attached is fit for my big head, but it causes static hair, which HURTS!!! I didn’t see that coming…Overall, for the price range, it is good.
This jacket fits really large. Order at least two sizes down.
